page.title: 06Commuting to London
page.content: Rayleigh Station was built in 1889 74% of fares are commuters Fares range from Â£4.30_Â£994 to London These are 1)a day return 2)An annual Monday and Friday are busiest. The line was electrified in 1962. Traction=electric,diesel,and D.M.U's 105 trains run on a weekday. Commuter trains run every 5mins/10mins Off peak service is every 20 mins. Sunday service is every 30 mins. Rayleigh is the busiest commuter stn. between Southend and Shenfield. The fastest train takes 45 mins. Normal trains take 55 mins. Children under 16 travel half fare. The car park can take 300 cars. Cost per day is 70p. The platforms are 295m long. No trains carry refreshments. 7 staff are on duty per shift.
